mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_experiences (student_user_id, company_name, position_title, start_date, end_date, description) VALUES (#{studentUserId}, #{companyName}, #{positionTitle}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE work_experiences SET company_name = #{companyName}, position_title = #{positionTitle}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, description = #{description} WHERE id = #{id} AND student_user_id = #{studentUserId}
